Battlefield Cripple

spell id [id]: 109
effect number [effect_number]: 11
damage [damage]: 16777216
spec [spec]: 27263104
casting time [casttime]: 100%
area of effect [aoe_s]: 50% of battlefield
number of effects [nreff]: 1
Cause Affliction: Cripple
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Nonmagical, May Use Underwater [uwok], Magic Resistance Negates Easily [mrnegateseasily])
With a horrible grinding noise, all units on the battlefield fall to the ground as their bones crack and break. Strong victims might get away with a broken bone, more unfortunate ones will become crippled for life. Ethereal beings are rarely hurt by the spell.
